name: Slots Pharaoh's Gold - All New, VIP Vegas Casino Slot Machine Games
name_original: Slots Pharaoh's Gold - All New, VIP Vegas Casino Slot Machine Games
description:
***** All new players will receive 10,000 FREE coins!!! *****

Play for FREE the worlds best Slots Game - Mega Wins and Free Coins for ALL!

Explore the golden tomb discovering awesome slot machines and hidden treasures. Play with stunning HD graphics and superb animations just like in a real Vegas casino.

This slot machine is worthy of the Pharaohs, and now it's your turn to play. Just tap to spin!

Premium features include:
- Stunning HD Graphics
- 5 reels with up to 30 lines!
- FREE daily gold coins!
- 3 deluxe mini-games to max your payouts!
- No internet connection required to play!
- Game Center integration - Compete against your friends and show them who's boss!

Good luck, and enjoy!
